mapper.select: SELECT video_no, lectureclass_no, video_title, video_content, to_char(video_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') video_date, video_file, video_image, video_path from video where lectureclass_no = #{lectureclass_no}
mapper.insert: insert into video values( SEQ_VIDEO.nextval, #{lectureclass_no}, #{video_title}, #{video_content}, sysdate, #{video_file}, #{video_path}, #{video_image})
mapper.select: select count(*) from video where video_title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' and lectureclass_no = #{lectureclass_no}
mapper.update: update video set video_title = #{video_title}, video_content = #{video_content}, video_date = sysdate, video_file = #{video_path}, video_path = #{video_path}, video_image = #{video_image} where video_no = #{video_no}
